shot.composition: Medium shot centered on the runner, with particular attention to the feet and sneakers at impact. Very shallow depth of field.
shot.camera_motion: Sequence 1 (0-8s): Smooth Steadicam tracking, following the runner from the side at her speed, then a slight push-in dolly movement to emphasize the power of the sprint. Sequence 2 (8-12s): Smooth transition to wider establishing shot, then slow push-in to capture detail and emotion. Sequence 3 (12-20s): Final close-up with subtle dolly movement, ending on a confident, impactful frame.
shot.frame_rate: 48 fps (for a slight cinematic slow motion in post-production)

physical.posture: Athletic, body leaning forward, arms and legs fully extended for the sprint.

facial_features.eyes: Focused, gaze fixed on the horizon

wardrobe.top: Technical sports bra, neon color (lemon green)
wardrobe.bottom: Short, light running shorts, matte black
wardrobe.footwear: Performance running sneakers (target product), white with bright orange accents
wardrobe.accessories: Discreet GPS sports watch on the left wrist

sequences.primary_motion: Powerful and explosive sprint on an athletics track. The action focuses on the stride transition and the energy transmitted to the ground.
Building on the initial action, the subject demonstrates additional aspects and benefits. The movement becomes more fluid and confident, showcasing expertise and comfort.
sequences.camera_follows: Wider shot revealing more context, then pushing in for detail

sequences.primary_motion: The subject concludes with a moment of satisfaction - a knowing smile, a final appreciative glance, or a confident gesture that conveys success and approval of the result.
sequences.camera_follows: Close-up on emotional response and final impactful moment

scene.location: Professional athletics track with bright blue tartan surface, 100m straight line.

layout.flooring: Blue synthetic tartan, with sharp white lines
layout.walls: Empty stands in the background, blurred due to shallow depth of field.

environment.background: Low sunlight creating long cast shadows. Dry and warm atmosphere.
environment.temporal_progression: Environment remains consistent throughout the 20-second narrative. Background elements may subtly shift focus as camera moves, but spatial continuity is maintained for coherent storytelling.

lighting.primary_source: Late day sun (Golden Hour) backlighting for a halo effect on the runner.
lighting.quality: Hard and directional light, softened by the heat haze of the track.
lighting.color_temperature: Very warm (5500K - 6000K), golden and orange tones.
lighting.key_to_fill_ratio: High (8:1), creating dramatic contrast between the silhouette and the bright background.
lighting.evolution: Lighting remains consistent throughout the 20-second sequence, maintaining the established mood. Subtle adjustments in intensity during the final 6 seconds to emphasize the emotional climax and create visual impact.

color_grading.palette: Saturated colors (blue tartan, neon top, orange sneakers) contrasting with warm skin tones and background.
color_grading.tone: Energetic, dramatic, and aspirational. High-end sports film look.

audio.ambient: Light wind, relative silence of the track.
audio.foley: Sequence 1 (0-8s): Sharp and powerful impact sounds of sneakers on tartan (each stride amplified), strong and rhythmic breathing of the runner. Sequence 2: Additional environmental sounds, subtle interactions with objects, breathing, fabric movement. Sequence 3: Final satisfying sound (smile, exhale, object placement), ambient fade.
audio.music: Minimalist and rhythmic electronic music, with a crescendo toward the end of the clip. The score builds progressively over 20 seconds, starting subtly and crescendoing toward the final moment. Emotional peak at 14-18s, then resolving with a confident, memorable final chord at 20s.

visual_rules.frame_purity: without text overlays, logos unless branded, no subtitles, no visible brand logos on clothing other than the product (sneakers).
visual_rules.realism: Bodywork with dynamic reflections of the environment. Mechanical details and premium finishes visible. Studio lighting revealing design lines. Realistic physics of movement and suspension.
visual_rules.continuity: Consistency of environmental reflections on the bodywork. Maintenance of vehicle cleanliness and finish. Continuity of lighting and ambiance. Smooth camera movements around the vehicle.
